long_description: A smooth leather thong/slide with intriguing texture, the Born Viv Thong Sandals for women give your summertime look a refreshing update. Full-grain leather uppers are lined with soft leather that's comfortable next to skin. Lightweight polyurethane outsoles offer good grip. Steel shanks add support for long days on your feet. Born Viv Thong Sandals have a heel height of 1.5 in.
short_description: A smooth leather thong/slide with intriguing texture, the Born Viv Thong Sandals for women give your summertime look a refreshing update.
